translation.ja: アクバー･ムハンマド 元マルコムＸ直属 副導師 アクバー･ムハンマド 元マルコムＸ直属 副導師 尊師を愛し従った者は 放っておいた 尊師を愛し従った者は 放っておいた

translation.ja: 尊師を愛し従った者は 放っておいた

translation.en: [John Ali] You don't have lentil soup today?
translation.ja: レンズ豆スープは？

translation.en: -[waiter] Lentil soup? -[John Ali] Yes.
translation.ja: レンズ豆？ うん

translation.en: [waiter] We do have it but we don't put it on the buffet.
translation.ja: あるけど ビュッフェにはない

translation.en: If you want to have it, we can get it for you, one order.
translation.ja: お望みなら別注文できますが

translation.en: -It's a lentil soup? -Yes.
translation.ja: お望みなら別注文できますが うん

translation.en: [waiter] Okay, I'll get it when you sit at the table.
translation.ja: テーブルに運びますよ

translation.en: [John Ali] The lentil and the navy bean we eat,
translation.ja: レンズ豆と白インゲンはいい

translation.en: but not the lima beans or black-eyed peas.
translation.ja: ライマメや黒目豆はダメ

translation.en: This is what the Messenger teaches.
translation.ja: それが使徒の教えだ

translation.en: [waiter] This is fresh tandoori chicken from the clay oven.
translation.ja: 土窯(つちがま)で焼いた タンドーリ･チキンです

translation.en: [John Ali] I had it before. It's okay.
translation.ja: 前にも食べたよ

translation.en: [waiter] You've had it before? Okay.
translation.ja: そう？

translation.en: [interviewer] Did you play a part in having Malcolm get killed?
translation.ja: マルコムの死に加担した？

translation.en: I could have, if I wanted to.
translation.ja: したければ できた

translation.en: [waiter] This is a lentil soup, the yellow color.
translation.ja: レンズ豆スープです

translation.en: [John Ali] You can put it right there.
translation.ja: そこへ置いて

translation.en: But I don't know who killed him.
translation.ja: 誰が殺したか知らない

translation.en: I know the Messenger didn't. I know I didn't order it, you know?
translation.ja: 使徒はやってない 私も命令していない

translation.en: Nobody from the FBI or local authorities, they never asked us anything about it.
translation.ja: ＦＢＩにも 地域の警察にも 一度も尋問されなかった

translation.en: They've written in the papers that we ordered for Malcolm to be killed,
translation.ja: 我々が殺害を命じたと 新聞には書いてあったが―

translation.en: But we didn't.
translation.ja: 我々じゃない

translation.en: You know, The Honorable Elijah Muhammad was a wise man.
translation.ja: 尊師は賢いお方だ

translation.en: That he wouldn't do such a stupid thing as to order someone, you know, to be killed,
translation.ja: 誰かを殺せと命じるなんて バカなことはしない

translation.en: Malcolm or anyone else.
translation.ja: マルコムでも誰でも

translation.en: If it hadn't been for the Messenger saying, "Leave him alone,"
translation.ja: 使徒が放っておけと 命じていなければ―

translation.en: then he would have been killed,
translation.ja: 殺されてたよ

translation.en: sooner than he was.
translation.ja: もっと前にね

translation.en: [Abdur-Rahman Muhammad] The key to understanding Malcolm's case
translation.ja: マルコムの事件を 理解する鍵は―

translation.en: is that from the very beginning, no one in the power structure gave a damn about what happened.
translation.ja: 権力階級の誰もが 気にも留めなかったこと

translation.en: His assassination was widely reported in the media,
translation.ja: 彼の暗殺は 大きく報道された

translation.en: especially the white media.
translation.ja: 特に白人メディアで

translation.en: But there was almost a sense that they were gloating.
translation.ja: でも嘲笑している印象が あった

translation.en: A sense of glee that he had it coming,
translation.ja: お前が招いたと 喜んでいるような

translation.en: like he almost deserved this.
translation.ja: 当然の罰みたいな

translation.en: [Garrow] It's clear, even in the New York Times in February of 1965,
translation.ja: ニューヨークタイムズの 1965年２月の記事もそうだ

translation.en: that white authorities and most white newsmen
translation.ja: 白人の政治家も報道記者も―

translation.en: didn't take this killing all that seriously.
translation.ja: この殺害を 真剣に扱っていない

translation.en: That from their perspective, it's some intra-gang warfare
translation.ja: 彼らの見方では この事件は 急進的な過激派黒人の ただのギャング間闘争

translation.en: among radical black extremists,
translation.ja: 急進的な過激派黒人の ただのギャング間闘争

translation.en: that they don't value what Malcolm's life represented.
translation.ja: マルコムの命の意味を 評価していない

translation.en: But the real bottom line to everything we have here
translation.ja: このすべてを見ると 言えることがある

translation.en: is that white prosecution authorities
translation.ja: 白人の検察当局は―

translation.en: have never, across this entire chunk of time, decades of time,
translation.ja: この長い年月の間 何十年にもわたり―

translation.en: taken a serious interest
translation.ja: マルコムの事件に 真剣に取り組まなかった

translation.en: in investigating, pursuing, solving Malcolm's murder.
translation.ja: マルコムの事件に 真剣に取り組まなかった 捜査し解決しようと してこなかったのだ

translation.en: For Abdur-Rahman Muhammad, this has been a very lonely crusade.
translation.ja: アブドル･ラハマーンには さぞ孤独な聖戦だろう

translation.en: Because time and again, he's had people who have some initial interest,
translation.ja: なぜなら最初は 興味を持っていた人が―

translation.en: and again and again, they've decided not to go forward.
translation.ja: 共に戦うのをやめるのを 何度も見てきたから

translation.en: But Abdur-Rahman has never given up. He's still on the case.
translation.ja: しかし 彼は諦めず 追い続けている

translation.en: [Abdur-Rahman Muhammad] After I became a Muslim, I started moving in certain circles,
translation.ja: イスラム教徒になり 付き合い始めた人たちがいる

translation.en: and over the years, I started meeting people who knew things about the assassination.
translation.ja: 長年かけて 暗殺の件を 知る人々に会うようになった

translation.en: You know, who could talk firsthand about it.
translation.ja: 実体験を話せる人たちだ

translation.en: I was like one or two people removed from actually being able to get certain information!
translation.ja: あと１～２人たどれば 確かな情報を得られる距離だ

translation.en: [Imam] You are sitting in a place that, in its history,
translation.ja: 今座っているのは―

translation.en: from the Nation of Islam under the Honorable Elijah Muhammad,
translation.ja: ムハンマド尊師のＮＯＩから 受け継いだ場所

translation.en: that when he started...
translation.ja: 当時は…

translation.en: [Abdur-Rahman Muhammad] That's when I realized that "Hey, if I started asking the right questions,
translation.ja: つまり うまく質問できれば

translation.en: I could get some very significant answers."
translation.ja: 重要な答えが得られる場所だ

translation.en: And if you were commanded to, you had to have a card in your pocket.
translation.ja: 命令に従う手段はあるか？

translation.en: [Abdur-Rahman Muhammad] But one of the things that you learn quickly,
translation.ja: でも すぐ分かったのは

translation.en: is you can't ask a question too directly.
translation.ja: 直接的すぎる質問は できないこと

translation.en: If you ask a question too directly, you could be suspect, you know.
translation.ja: ストレートすぎると疑われる

translation.en: Because then the question would become, "Why are you asking that, brother?"
translation.ja: “なぜ 聞く？”と尋ねられる

translation.en: When Malcolm first got here,
translation.ja: マルコムが入った時―

translation.en: was there any inkling
translation.ja: ムハンマド尊師との間に 問題が生じると―

translation.en: or any idea that maybe he was having a problem
translation.ja: ムハンマド尊師との間に 問題が生じると― うっすらとでも 感じていたんでしょうか

translation.en: with the Honorable Elijah Muhammad?
translation.ja: うっすらとでも 感じていたんでしょうか

translation.en: Or, uh, 'cause I know '63...
translation.ja: だって1963年には…

translation.en: Once I would learn something and I would file it away,
translation.ja: 何か学んだら― 記録し 点と点を結んでいく

translation.en: and I'd connect this dot with that dot,
translation.ja: 記録し 点と点を結んでいく

translation.en: or at least be pointed in a certain direction.
translation.ja: 最低でも何らかの方向性が 見える

translation.en: You know, and it became more and more apparent to me
translation.ja: そのうち分かってきた

translation.en: that if anybody could break it, it would be me.
translation.ja: 誰かが解明できるとしたら 自分以外にいない

translation.en: Most serious historians believe
translation.ja: 多くの歴史家たちは

translation.en: there were five men who were the actual assassins.
translation.ja: 実際の殺し屋は５人だったと 思っている

translation.en: According to my research,
translation.ja: 私の調べでは

translation.en: I believe those assassins didn't come from Harlem
translation.ja: 彼らは ハーレムの人間じゃない

translation.en: as the police claimed.
translation.ja: 警察の見解とは違う

translation.en: And I also believe that something has been covered up.
translation.ja: また何かが 隠蔽(いんぺい)されていると思う

translation.en: We have at least one FBI document
translation.ja: ＦＢＩの書類の一つに

translation.en: that gives a... you know, a perfect description
translation.ja: ＦＢＩの書類の一つに 散弾銃を撃った男が 正確に描写されている

translation.en: of the man that they say fired the shotgun.
translation.ja: 散弾銃を撃った男が 正確に描写されている

translation.en: They described him to a tee.
translation.ja: “Ｔ”という名で

translation.en: Burly, big, dark-skinned man wearing a certain kind of coat.
translation.ja: 頑丈 大柄 肌が黒い 男性 コートを着ていた

translation.en: Complete opposite of the man they convicted.
translation.ja: 有罪になった男とまるで違う

translation.en: So someone in the government must have known that they might be convicting the wrong person,
translation.ja: 政府は別人だと 知っていたはずだが

translation.en: and they let it happen.
translation.ja: 放置した

translation.en: And I think that it's only by looking deeply into Malcolm's life
translation.ja: マルコムの人生を 詳しく調べれば

translation.en: that the clues as to who actually killed him,
translation.ja: 計画を知っていた者と 真犯人を知るヒントが

translation.en: and who knew it was coming, can be found.
translation.ja: 計画を知っていた者と 真犯人を知るヒントが 見えてくると思う

translation.en: [woman] You are not only honoring Malcolm in the sunshine,
translation.ja: マルコムを讃えるわ 晴れの日だけでなく―

translation.en: but in the rain.
translation.ja: 雨の日も

translation.en: And the prayer is that you're not only honoring him on his birthday,
translation.ja: 願わくば 彼の誕生日だけでなく毎日―

translation.en: but every day with the work that you do.
translation.ja: 私たちの行いで 彼を讃えられますように

translation.en: In the name of el-Hajj Malik el-Shabazz,
translation.ja: エル＝ハジ･マリク･ エル＝シャバーズの名の下に

translation.en: in the name of freedom, and black liberation.
translation.ja: エル＝ハジ･マリク･ エル＝シャバーズの名の下に 自由と黒人解放の名の下に

translation.en: Because that is how we truly honor Malcolm.
translation.ja: 私たちの行いが 真にマルコムを讃える

translation.en: [Abdur-Rahman Muhammad] When we say we love Malcolm X,
translation.ja: マルコムＸ― 別名 エル＝ハジ･マリク･ エル＝シャバーズ

translation.en: el-Hajj Malik el-Shabazz,
translation.ja: 別名 エル＝ハジ･マリク･ エル＝シャバーズ

translation.en: we love him so much, we name high schools and institutions after him.
translation.ja: 我々の愛は 高校や団体の名に表れている

translation.en: He's one of our greatest heroes.
translation.ja: 最も偉大な英雄の一人だ

translation.en: [Malcolm X] You don't scare Negroes today
translation.ja: 現代の黒人は―

translation.en: with no badge, or no white skin, or no white sheet, or no white anything else.
translation.ja: 記章 白い肌や白い紙など 白いものを何も恐れない

translation.en: [Muhammad] Yet the real killers, the real culprits,
translation.ja: しかし 本当に殺した 真犯人は―

translation.en: both those who actually fired the trigger, and those who were, let's say, the puppet masters of the whole thing,
translation.ja: 銃を撃った奴らも 陰から操った奴らも

translation.en: were never brought to justice.
translation.ja: 捕まっていない

translation.en: But if you can't prove that a democracy is not hypocrisy,
translation.ja: 民主主義が偽善でないと 証明できないなら

translation.en: then don't put your hands on me.
translation.ja: 私には手を出すな

translation.en: [Muhammad] There's no statute of limitations on murder.
translation.ja: 殺人には時効がない

translation.en: Yes!
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: [Muhammad] There's no reason why this case cannot be looked at again.
translation.ja: この事件は もう一度 検証できるはずだ

translation.en: That is my mission. That is my purpose.
translation.ja: 墓前に立ち… それが私の使命 私の目標だ

translation.en: As long as someone is still out there,
translation.ja: 捕まっていない奴らが いる限り―

translation.en: you know, there is a chance, still,
translation.ja: まだチャンスはある

translation.en: to get justice for Malcolm.
translation.ja: マルコムに正義を捧げる
